about.me: Software engineer with 3 YoE in QA and Frontend development.

items.name: Features at IBM
items.shortDesc: A collection of awesome features that I got to work on while working at IBM Aspera

items.name: Tree View
items.shortDesc: A React component that allows user to browse and manage data between local and cloud storage

items.name: PawsitiveID
items.shortDesc: A hackathon project that my friend and I worked on to develop an iOS app to utilize Google Maps API to help people find their lost pets

items.name: Farm PPE
items.shortDesc: A React website focusing on providing resources for local farmers in Yolo county
items.description: While working as a student programmer at UC Davis, I got to developed my first website outside of school work. This was a challenging task as there were no concepts, design or leads. The goal was to create a friendly UI and UX that allows user to digest the information

items.name: Tractivity
items.shortDesc: A fitness web application that help users keep track of their daily activities and plan for future activity

items.name: LoL - Toxic behaviors
items.shortDesc: A school project to analyze toxic behaviors from the popular MOBA game, League of Legends. Web scraped data from their official forumns and OP.GG and used NLP to attempt to find patterns in player behaviors

items.name: Battleship
items.shortDesc: A text based implementation of Battleship where users can battle other players or an AI

past.title: Software Engineer
description: Worked on the frontend for SaaS and on-premise enterprise web application by collaborating with design and product management to scope and plan features for our customers
Developed a file tree structure component for managing content on local and cloud storage by focusing on UX to create similar functionality to standard OS file trees
Migrated charting system to ChartJs to improve processing of large transfer volume and better handling of real-time rendering

past.title: Automation Quality Engineer
description: Lead the development for unit, functional, and regression test suites for Linksys hardware and API services utilizing PyTest and Selenium
Improved existing Wi-Fi test bed automations and leveraged AWS S3 and Microsoft Sharepoint API to reduce 75% manual data aggregation from the QA Team

past.title: System Test Engineer
description: Executed and validated the mobile embedded system boot-up test plan throughout the SDLC, leveraging Python to improve test coverage by 25%
Developed Python automation to collect KPI metrics and generate Excel reports, reducing the process from 4 hours to 10 minutes
Designed a targeted test plan to validate encryption and decryption process for existing system feature

past.companyName: UC Davis, School of Veterinary Medicine
past.title: Student Programmer
description: Designed, developed, and maintained a Single-page web application in React for the department of Center for Animal Disease Modeling and Surveilance
Utilized Python and Postman to automate web scraping and preprocess raw data, transforming it into structured datasets for ingestion
